text: Camille Polfer (November 21, 1924 in Namur - March 19, 1983 in Luxembourg City) was a Luxembourgian sports teacher and politician of the Democratic Party (DP). He was mayor of Luxembourg City from 1980 to 1981, and was succeeded by his daughter Lydie Polfer due to his poor health. == References == * List of mayors of Luxembourg City Category:1924 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Luxembourgian mayors Category:Luxembourgian sportspeople Category:People from Namur (city) Category:Teachers
title: Camille Polfer
